selectTheOptionDesc.title: Submitting an anonymous broken site report helps us improve the app.
selectTheOptionDesc.note: The user will see this UI when they're running into issues with a given website, that we may be causing

pickYourIssueFromTheList.title: Describe what happened
pickYourIssueFromTheList.note: Asks the user to pick a specific list from the pulldown

blocked.title: Site blocked or didn't load
blocked.note: User is reporting this page because the page didn't load

layout.title: Site layout broken
layout.note: User is reporting this page because the page layout appears broken

emptySpaces.title: Site contains large empty spaces
emptySpaces.note: User is reporting this page because the page contains large empty spaces

videos.title: Video didn’t play or load
videos.note: User is reporting this page because a video didn't play or load correctly

images.title: Images didn't load
images.note: User is reporting this page because one or more images did not load

comments.title: Comments, reviews, or chats didn’t load
comments.note: User is reporting this page because one or more comments did not load

content.title: Content is missing
content.note: User is reporting this page because some other type of content did not load

links.title: Links or buttons don't work
links.note: User is reporting this page because one or more links or buttons did not work when clicked

login.title: Can’t sign in/register
login.note: User is reporting this page because they are unable to log into the website

shopping.title: Can't pay, check out, or shop
shopping.note: User is reporting this page because they are unable to log into the website

browser.title: Browser or other browser extension issue
browser.note: User is reporting this page because there a problem with the browser or another extension

paywall.title: Site asked me to disable ad blocker
paywall.note: User is reporting this page asked them to disable their privacy or ad blocking extension

other.title: Something else
other.note: User is reporting this page because of some other reason than the ones we listed

tellUsMoreDesc.title: Share more details (optional):{bullet}What happened?{bullet}What should have happened?{bullet}Did turning protections off help?
tellUsMoreDesc.note: A hint for a text box that lets user enter free text to describe their problem. There are 3 questions as a guide, and each 'bullet' is replaced with a bullet point - such as '• What happened?'

reportsAreAnonymousDesc.title: Reports sent to DuckDuckGo only include info required to help us address your feedback.
reportsAreAnonymousDesc.note: A small disclaimer at the bottom of the view describing what is included in the report

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.note: Title for what the user sees upon submitting the report

yourReportWillHelpDesc.title: Your report will help improve our products and make the experience better for other people.
yourReportWillHelpDesc.note: Body that the user sees upon submitting the report

siteNotWorkingTitle.title: Site not working? Let us know.

siteNotWorkingSubTitle.title: Anonymous reports help DuckDuckGo fix issues caused by privacy protections.

reportsNoInfoSent.title: Info sent in reports can't be used to identify you:
reportsNoInfoSent.note: This text emphasizes that the sent reports do not contain any personally identifiable information.

dynamic_wvVersion.title: Web browser engine version number
dynamic_wvVersion.note: This text represents the version number of the web browser engine.

dynamic_requests.title: Hostnames of trackers blocked, surrogate requests, ignored requests, and requests not in tracker blocking list
dynamic_requests.note: This text provides information about various types of requests, including blocked trackers and ignored requests.

dynamic_features.title: List of which protections and browser features were active
dynamic_features.note: This text represents a list of active protections and browser features.

dynamic_appVersion.title: App version number
dynamic_appVersion.note: This text indicates the version number of the app.

dynamic_atb.title: Anonymous experiment group for feature testing
dynamic_atb.note: This text represents an anonymous group for testing features.

dynamic_errorDescriptions.title: Browser-reported errors
dynamic_errorDescriptions.note: This text provides a list of errors reported by the browser.

dynamic_extensionVersion.title: Extension version number
dynamic_extensionVersion.note: This text indicates the version number of the extension.

dynamic_httpErrorCodes.title: Website response status (HTTP) codes
dynamic_httpErrorCodes.note: This text provides a list of response status codes from the website.

dynamic_lastSentDay.title: Date of last report sent for this site
dynamic_lastSentDay.note: This text indicates the date of the last report sent for the site.

dynamic_device.title: Device make, model, and manufacturer
dynamic_device.note: This text provides information about the device, including make, model, and manufacturer.

dynamic_os.title: Operating system version number
dynamic_os.note: This text indicates the version number of the operating system.

dynamic_reportFlow.title: Which reporting form you used ("menu", "dashboard", etc.)
dynamic_reportFlow.note: This text represents the path the user took to get to this feedback screen.

dynamic_siteUrl.title: Page URL (without identifiable info)
dynamic_siteUrl.note: This text represents the URL of the page, without including any identifiable information.

dynamic_listVersions.title: Information about which versions of our protections were active
dynamic_listVersions.note: This text represents the URL of the page, without including any identifiable information.

dynamic_didOpenReportInfo.title: Whether or not you opted to show this report info
dynamic_didOpenReportInfo.note: This text represents if the user has opted to see a list of information, or not.
